review_data.title: excellent quality and tasty fast food
review_data.content: Take away short before closing hour: fresh and high quality fast food choice with very friendly service short before closing shop. Very clean and appetizing, an excellent choice after a long working day. Thank you Team Zapote Löwenstrasse!

review_data.title: First try

review_data.title: Good food, fast served always
review_data.content: Good food, fast served always delicous. Much love for the planted chicken & the homemade ice tea ❤️😋👌🏼.

review_data.title: Burritos 🤤
review_data.content: Die Burritos waren geschmacklich super. Sehr nette Bedienung und Preise sehr angenehm. Nur zum Empfehlen!

review_data.title: Schmeckt gut, tut gut
review_data.content: Das Essen schmeckt lecker und die Bedienung ist super freundlich! War nicht das letzte Mal dort mit Freunden.

review_data.title: Pretty good California style Mexican - for Switzerland
review_data.content: I have been here a few times for a quick lunch. It's by far the best burrito place I have found in Zurich: made in front of you, customised with the right sort of things (spicy tofu and black beans but no random feta or...More

review_data.title: Just what I was craving
review_data.content: This place is Cal/ Mex/ chipotle inspired. I was craving a fresh bowl and this restaurant definitely fulfilled it. Forget about the other bowls, burritos you’ve eaten before and come here open minded. I like that there’s two rice options and they’re both tasty. I...More

review_data.title: Well, what to say...
review_data.content: This place advertises California style burritos. I am from California and have eaten hundreds of burritos from small neighborhood taqueria's over the years. This place is light years away from those. They offer several types of basic burritos. My wife and I opted for the...More

review_data.title: Lovely rice bowl!
review_data.content: I miss California Mexican food and had given up on zurich ever having any. But then I stumbled upon this place. Just had a delicious skinny girl rice bowl and will be coming back to try other dishes.
